none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 14, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Hopelessly brilliant late '10s North American hardcore punk firmly rooted in early '80s North American hardcore punk. To listen to "I Can't Die" is to wish that you could die....so listen. ZIG ZAG
